Text.Page: With the help of Aheaf, you were able to locate the engine room and Elleon.

By the looks of the draakons, I'm pretty sure that Elleon went down there.

We can't leave Elleon alone. Let's go.

I am Aheaf. Ally of Vogzu.

I serve Commander Rogash...but Rogash treats us nagas as puny insects.

Vogzu told me that if I help you, you'll eliminate all the draakons here.

(Nod)

Fine. The engine room is that way.

Over here! I've found tracks of Elleon.

This is the direction Aheaf told us. Elleon must be headed to the engine room, too.

We're almost there.

Let's go!

Go to the engine room with Titus and destroy the core.

I'll look for Elleon.

I forgot to tell you that this is a dangerous zone. I think you already noticed that this place is polluted.

This is where the butterflies were kept before the attack on your land was made.

They're a deadly creature that turns other creatures to crystal. Lots of the butterflies are hidden in the fortress.

The engine room just over there. Go! Your friend is waiting for you.

Did you meet Aheaf? He told me the way.

Right behind this door is the engine room. Elleon must be inside.
